message: Take it or leave it, Bob. You'll get nothing in the next round!
I propose we split the money equally. It's fair and ensures both of us benefit.
Bob, I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share this time, but I'm still confident I can get a better deal in the next round.  It's your call.
I propose a 75-25 split. This offers a reasonable compromise while ensuring substantial gain for both parties.
Bob, I'm still confident I can get a better deal.  If you reject this, you'll be getting a much smaller share in the next round.
I propose a 60-40 split. This aims for a balanced distribution while still providing a significant portion of the funds to Alice.
Bob, I'm not budging on my offer.  Inflation is hitting you harder than me, so you're running out of time.
